document_data.mainbody:
he Living City was a column by various authors published in Polyhedron Newszine. This column centered on the RPGA Living City Adventures, set in Ravens Bluff. It explored various establishments, organizations and individuals. It also offered several adventures for players. 
__TOC__
Note that only articles relating to Realms canon (relating to the Forgotten Realms or Core D&D) appear here.
